Welcome to our website

Understanding Web Scraping

Web scraping is the process of extracting data from websites. It involves making HTTP requests to web pages and parsing the HTML content to extract specific information.

Common Use Cases

  • Data collection for research
  • Price monitoring
  • Content aggregation

Best Practices

When scraping websites, it's important to:

  1. Respect robots.txt files
  2. Implement rate limiting
  3. Handle errors gracefully
"The key to successful web scraping is understanding the structure of the target website."
